thread.section_title: Travelgenio opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Travelgenio | www.travelgenio.com
thread.title: Hilde

author: Hilde
title: Hilde
text: I booked my flight to Melbourne Australia via travelgenio. I contacted them a few times to make sure of some arrangements and they assisted me everytime very effeciently. The flight that they booked for me was very cheap and with a very trusted airline (Etihad Airways) I had a very long stop over of 16hours in Abu Dhabi but that was not a problem for me. Thanks for great and affordable service Travelgenio! 5572201
